00034 #ifndef UPNPMANAGER_H
00035 #define UPNPMANAGER_H
00036 
00037 #include <QObject>
00038 #include <QTimer>
00039 
00040 #include "KviPointerList.h"
00041 #include "igdcontrolpoint.h"
00042 #include "SsdpConnection.h"
00043 
00044 namespace UPnP
00045 {
00046 
00056 class Manager : public QObject
00057 {
00058         Q_OBJECT
00059 
00060 public:  // public methods
00061 
00062         // The destructor
00063         virtual             ~Manager();
00064 
00065         // Return the external IP address
00066         QString              getExternalIpAddress() const;
00067 
00068         // Return the instance of the manager class
00069         static Manager *     instance();
00070 
00071         // Return true if a controlable gateway is available
00072         bool                 isGatewayAvailable();
00073 
00074         // Add a port mapping
00075         void                 addPortMapping(const QString &protocol, const QString &remoteHost, int externalPort, const QString &internalClient, int internalPort, const QString &description, bool enabled = true, int leaseDuration = 0);
00076         // Delete a port mapping
00077         void                 deletePortMapping(const QString &protocol, const QString &remoteHost, int externalPort);
00078 
00079 private slots:
00080         // The broadcast failed
00081         void                 slotBroadcastTimeout();
00082         // A device was discovered by the SSDP broadcast
00083         void                 slotDeviceFound(const QString &hostname, int port, const QString &rootUrl);
00084 
00085 
00086 private:  // private methods
00087         // The constructor  (it's a singleton)
00088                                 Manager();
00089         // Disable the copy constructor
00090                                 Manager(const Manager &);
00091         // Disable the assign operator
00092         Manager&             operator=(const Manager&);
00093         // Initialize the manager, detect all devices
00094         void                 initialize();
00095 
00096 private:
00097         // The active control point we're working with
00098         IgdControlPoint     *m_pActiveIgdControlPoint;
00099         // True if the broadcast failed (false during the discovery process)
00100         bool                 m_bBroadcastFailed;
00101         // True if the broadcast found a device (false during the discovery process)
00102         bool                 m_bBroadcastFoundIt;
00103         // The instance of the singleton class
00104         static Manager      *m_pInstance;
00105         // A list of all detected gateway devices
00106         KviPointerList<IgdControlPoint> m_lIgdControlPoints;
00107         // The SSDP connection to find all UPnP devices
00108         SsdpConnection      *m_pSsdpConnection;
00109         // The timer to detect a broadcast timeout
00110         QTimer              *m_pSsdpTimer;
00111 };
